item.title: Portscan
item.description: This experiment is about running a port scan of the client accessing this page. How is this done you may ask ? Well I did not invent it, so kudos to Avi Lumelsky who wrote this brilliant article : Browsers â€” A Localhost Gateway: Client Port Scanning Using WebAssembly And Go. The global principle is to have the browser make HTTP requests locally, on every port that you want to scan.
